'''The Overflow''' is [[Candace]]'s Level 6 [[Constellation]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* The Normal Attack action that can trigger The Overflow's effect is required to deal Normal Attack DMG, in addition to be Elemental DMG. Normal Attack actions that do not deal Normal Attack DMG will not trigger this effect.
